EmailTemplate.name: Production Return Order Quote - Final Reminder (CSR Generated)
EmailTemplate.subject: Production Return Order: Final Reminder {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Production Return Order: Final Reminder
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We’ve been watching our email like a hawk.
But the updated purchase order we need from you to start on your production return unit (Part number: {!Case.Product_Part__c} and Serial number: {!Case.Product_Serial_Number__c}) for your PO No. {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c} still hasn’t reached us.
Unfortunately, that leaves us unable to start your repair. If you believe that you’ve provided us this information, please reply to this email.
Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We look forward to the opportunity to serve you in the future.
Yours sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
